HiddenText.Name: Social Volunteer
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Volunteers make up the core of those who actually do the work of creating, planning, and carrying out events and programs. Generally, volunteers in each area of Social-Events area are organized into committees depending on interests. These councils are led by a Program Manager. Volunteers can expect to be taught/trained/mentored by the Program Managers and to receive assignments from the Managers that pertain to the event. Meetings that pertain to the event will be required as will regularly reporting to the Program Manager. Volunteers are where the "rubber hits the road" in Activities and are extremely valuable to the success of what we do.
